content.content: Hi everyone, below is thing I found missing in EVM Like Now there exist BLOCKHASH Geting the hash of one of the 256 most recent complete blocks there should be: BLOCKSTATEHASH returning stateRoot same way BLOCKHASH returns hash That would allows for much easier on-Chain merkle proofs of former state of a blockchain Example usecase On-Chain Voting that do not require token locking and still prevent multiple votes with same tokens
